languages.text: "Из далекого цивилизованного мира — да, на Тассере нет многого, к чему я привык, но вскоре после назначения я полюбил этот мир всей душой. Надеюсь, что за свой визит вы тоже хоть немного, но проникнетесь к Тассере".

"From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."
languages.original_text: "Из далекого цивилизованного мира — да, на Тассере нет многого, к чему я привык, но вскоре после назначения я полюбил этот мир всей душой. Надеюсь, что за свой визит вы тоже хоть немного, но проникнетесь к Тассере".

traits.locale_text: "From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet soon after my appointment I grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

"From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet soon after my appointment I grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

"From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

"From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

languages.text: 「遠い文明世界から来た。確かにタセラには、慣れていたものはほとんどない。だが、ここに赴任してすぐ、この星が心底気に入った。滞在中に、お前もタセラに少しは愛着が湧けばいい。」
languages.original_text: "From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

traits.locale_text: 「遠い文明世界から来た。確かにタセラには、慣れていたものはほとんどない。だが、ここに赴任してすぐ、この星が心底気に入った。滞在中に、お前もタセラに少しは愛着が湧けばいい。」

languages.text: «De un mundo civilizado muy lejano; en verdad Thassera carece de muchos lujos a los que estaba acostumbrado, pero tras ser destinado aquí no tardé en enamorarme de este planeta. Espero que usted también encuentre un hueco en su corazón para Thassera durante su visita».
languages.original_text: "From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

traits.locale_text: «De un mundo civilizado muy lejano; en verdad Thassera carece de muchos lujos a los que estaba acostumbrado, pero tras ser destinado aquí no tardé en enamorarme de este planeta. Espero que usted también encuentre un hueco en su corazón para Thassera durante su visita».

languages.text: “我来自某个遥远的文明世界。是啊，很多我耳熟能详的东西，塔瑟拉都没有。不过，自从来到这颗行星之后，我很快便全心全意地爱上了这里。希望您在造访期间，也能对塔瑟拉产生些许感情。”
languages.original_text: "From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

traits.locale_text: “我来自某个遥远的文明世界。是啊，很多我耳熟能详的东西，塔瑟拉都没有。不过，自从来到这颗行星之后，我很快便全心全意地爱上了这里。希望您在造访期间，也能对塔瑟拉产生些许感情。”

languages.text: "Von einer fernen zivilisierten Welt ... ja, Thassera fehlt es an Vielem, was ich gewohnt war, aber nach meiner Berufung hierher ist mir dieser Planet schnell ans Herz gewachsen. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet Thassera im Laufe Eures Besuchs auch ein wenig zu schätzen lernen."
languages.original_text: "From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

traits.locale_text: "Von einer fernen zivilisierten Welt ... ja, Thassera fehlt es an Vielem, was ich gewohnt war, aber nach meiner Berufung hierher ist mir dieser Planet schnell ans Herz gewachsen. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet Thassera im Laufe Eures Besuchs auch ein wenig zu schätzen lernen."

languages.text: « D'un lointain monde civilisé. Oui, il manque à Thassera bien des conforts auxquels je m'étais habitué, mais ayant été nommé ici, je me suis rapidement pris d'affection pour cette planète. J'espère que cette visite vous permettra, à vous aussi, d'apprendre à apprécier Thassera. »
languages.original_text: "From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

traits.locale_text: « D'un lointain monde civilisé. Oui, il manque à Thassera bien des conforts auxquels je m'étais habitué, mais ayant été nommé ici, je me suis rapidement pris d'affection pour cette planète. J'espère que cette visite vous permettra, à vous aussi, d'apprendre à apprécier Thassera. »

languages.text: "Uzak, medeni bir dünyadan geliyorum. Thassera, alıştığım birçok şeyden yoksun olsa da buraya atandıktan sonra bu gezegeni tüm kalbimle sevmeye başladım. Umarım ziyaretiniz sırasında siz de Thassera'ya karşı az da olsa sevgi duymaya başlarsınız."
languages.original_text: "From a distant civilised world — yes, Thassera lacks much of what I was accustomed to, yet after my appointment here, I quickly grew to love this planet with all my heart. I hope that during your visit you, too, will come to feel at least some affection for Thassera."

traits.locale_text: "Uzak, medeni bir dünyadan geliyorum. Thassera, alıştığım birçok şeyden yoksun olsa da buraya atandıktan sonra bu gezegeni tüm kalbimle sevmeye başladım. Umarım ziyaretiniz sırasında siz de Thassera'ya karşı az da olsa sevgi duymaya başlarsınız."
